name: Deep Static
description:
Description

Set in a Bunker surrounded by a poisonous mist. You must use your RC Car to collect supplies and discover the origins of the how the Red Mist came to be.

Your RC Car is the only way of seeing the outside world, take care to ensure that it doesn't fall prey to the mutated humans surrounding the bunker.

Features:

Use the RC Car to retrieve supplies from the outside world.

Avoid the giant chasms that surround the bunker.

Find hidden VHS Tapes scattered throughout the bunker to learn more about the Red Mist's origin.

A short experience intended to be completed under half an hour.
